Function nseSpeciesRichnessDeprecated¶

  • Defined in File neutral_analytical.cpp

Function Documentation¶

long double neutral_analytical::nseSpeciesRichnessDeprecated(const unsigned long &community_size, const long double &speciation_rate)¶

Gets the expected species richness for a non-spatially explicit neutral model.

Using the sampling formula from Vallade and ﻿Houchmandzadeh (2003).

Return
the number of species expected to exist
Parameters
  • community_size: the number of individuals in the community
  • speciation_rate: the speciation rate
